io.micronaut.context.event

Interface ApplicationEventListener<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - An event
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RetryEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoRegistration, FileWatchRestartListener, HeartbeatTask, RefreshScope, SessionWebSocketEventListener

    @Indexed(value=ApplicationEventListener.class)
public interface ApplicationEventListener<E>
extends java.util.EventListener
    An interface for receivers of application events.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Method Summary

      void onApplicationEvent(E event)
      Handle an application event.
      default boolean supports(E event)
      Whether the given event is supported.
